Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wilson
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan and Foster : due to street blockage near Broadway/Wilson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan and Foster : due to street blockage near Broadway/Wilson.

Allow extra travel time.
